Why Choose
Us

Reliable China Sourcing

We connect you to trusted suppliers and ensure you get the best value for your money.

Quality Assurance on Every Device

Every product is thoroughly tested before shipping to guarantee performance and durability.

Fast Dispatch & Smooth Logistics

With our efficient sea and air shipment options, your products arrive on time, every time.

Flexible Wholesale Options

Order from as low as one unit or get even better deals when buying in bulk.

Expert Handling & Risk Mitigation

Our sourcing fee covers the deep expertise, verification, and compliance checks that keep your business safe.

TESTIMONIALS

What Our Clients Say

We’ve helped individuals and businesses across Kenya source and ship products from China with confidence. Here’s what some of our clients have to say about working with Nilo Logistics.

4.8

Average Customer Rating

  • “I was skeptical about importing iPhones, but Nilo Logistics handled everything. The iPhone 12 I received was in perfect condition, and the warranty gave me total peace of mind!”
    Kevin O.
    Nairobi, Kenya
  • “As a reseller, margins are everything. Sourcing directly through Nilo saved me 30% compared to local wholesalers. Highly recommended!”
    Sarah W.
    Eldoret, Kenya
  • “Their sea shipping is organized and reliable. My office furniture arrived safely and the sourcing team kept me updated at every step. Truly professional.”
    David M.,
    Nakuru, Kenya
